welcome_msg_1: Our site is designed for building new teams.
welcome_msg_2: We hope that you will be able to make your team using our website and we wish you and your new team success in the future.
info_desc_1: We have the largest database of professionals, where you can easily find new specialists and create a new team, or find a team and become part of it. You can register and start searching for your team using various criteria, and find exactly the team that best meets your requirements.
info_desc_2: Our specialists are the most beautiful, talented and full of new ideas, they come up with and implement a lot of projects every month, as well as give many companies good advice for continuing and developing their business.
info_desc_3: There are many well-known companies that have found employees in our database of specialists, as well as many companies that have started their way of creating a team with us. Our platform also allows you to collaborate with other companies and teams, which opens up even more opportunities for success.
info_desc_4: There are many ways to achieve success and reach new heights, and one of the foundations of this is a good and professional team, good specialists not only perform their work efficiently, but also help the business to flourish and develop, giving it new ideas and dynamically modifying the project in accordance with the requirements of new technologies.
not_found_msg_1: We are glad to see you on our website
not_found_msg_2: We didn't find what you're looking for. You can use the navigation menu to find what interests you, or you can contact us and describe how you came to this page. In any case, we hope that you will find what you were looking for...
already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign in
do_not_have_account: Don't have an account? Sign Up

incorrect_password_help: The length should be between 6-32 characters, have 1 Digit (0-9), 1 UpperCase (A-Z), 1 LowerCase (a-z).
